channel.title: ChatOps on My learning and diary
channel.description: Recent content in ChatOps on My learning and diary

item.title: Do you still need to care ChatOps
item.description: ChatOps still has its place, even more prominent with AI and rich integration with other systems. I heard ChatOps in the past when I first heard hubot. Later GitOps and Kubernetes grabbed my attention. I didn’t see how ChatOps fit in GitOps until I saw this 湾区日报是如何运作的？ today.
